description: Global energy consumption is increasing, having huge impacts on the environment and our wallets. Governments, corporations and regulators have tried to address this issue by persecuting consumers in an attempt to get them to change their behaviour, however, to induce change on a global scale, consumers need to be incentivised, not persecuted. Energi Token is the solution, it is a reward scheme with real monetary benefits to it's users incentivising consumers to be more mindful of their energy consumption and reduce their overall carbon footprint.
name: Energi Token
